participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated, Emily enjoys volunteering and helping animals. She's responsible and values community service.
participant_1.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and sociable, Lucas is focused on his education while balancing work. He enjoys meeting new people and has a fun-loving spirit.
participant_2.background: i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i do not like chicken. i've blonde hair and blue eyes. i'm in college to become a nurse.
